Text: Why,thank you kind Sir you are spoiling us now !looking forward to hearing this (and his WBL stuff) for the first time ever..always look forward to your uploads,you have been putting out some great and difficult to find music recently,long may it continue ! Will be seeding this (and the others) for a good while yet,I also might be asking you for a wee request again..you never know..ha ha !
Always happy to take requests, guys (unless it's for stuff that I REALLY don't like...you know, the latest boy-band... shit like that)
Hi Art. I was wondering if you had Ruthie Foster - CROSSOVER - 1999 , RUNAWAY SOUL - 2002, STAGES - 2004. :D)
